original_text: It is not only me. Every Christian who wants to live in a way that pleases God will have trouble from other people.
korean_text: 무릇 그리스도 예수 안에서 경건하게 살고자 하는 자는 박해를 받으리라

sentences.original_text: who wants to live in a way that pleases God
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님을 기쁘시게 하는 방식으로 살고 싶어하는

sentences.original_text: will have trouble from other people.
